text: A leadership election was held by the Pan-Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS) on 4 June 2015. It was won by incumbent President of PAS, Abdul Hadi Awang. ==Timeline== * 1 March 2015 – Nominations open * 30 April 2015 – Nominations close * 4 June 2015 – Ballots of delegates * 4 June 2015 – Results announced ==Central Working Committee election results== [ Source] ===Permanent Chairman=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !! Delegates' votes !!
